Right-click Context Menu for Enhanced Exploratory Testing.
Enhance your exploratory testing in Chrome with a specialized right-click context menu. Bug Magnet provides quick access to common problematic values and edge cases for editable elements, streamlining your testing process.

Key Features:
1. Quick Access: Instantly access common boundary values and edge cases during testing.
2. Customizable: Easily extend functionality with your own configuration files.
3. Wide Compatibility: Works with input fields, text areas, and content editable DIVs.
4. Multi-frame Support: Compatible with multi-frame pages from the same domain.
5. Minimal Overhead: Adds less than 1k per page, with no third-party library dependencies, ensuring it remains passive and non-intrusive to your web app's execution.
